title: The Agatu New Testament
title_vernacular: Okonu E̳pe̳pe̳ Nondu Galo̳ : Jiso̳s Kraist, O̳ce̳ ni Ny'alo̳, Ja Ti Galo̳.
description: The first New Testament in Agatu. Translated by R. T. Dibble, Spencer J. Dibble, Hugh D. and Violet M. Mackay (CMML ), Adam Agabi, Omaye Ojakele, Omaye Ogweje, and Eigege Ogule.
